content.p: Our LGBTQIA+ Staff Network is here to support lesbian, gay, bi, trans, queer, intersex, aro(/)ace employees within the University of Nottingham. We aim together to create a more LGBTQIA+ inclusive work environment and embrace diversity. The network uses our own private Microsoft Team where we share stories, updates, news, events and more. To join in all you have to do is complete our form below. The data collected by this form will be used only for the explicit use of providing you with access to our Microsoft Team group. It will be processed in line with UK and EU data protection law. This data processing is covered by our central privacy notices. Join us online and complete our joining form. The network is here to: Get in touch with the LGBTQIA+ network Follow us on Twitter Follow us on LinkedIn
